channel.title: Not recognizing Java
channel.description: I have the latest java installed (update 18). I set my class path, and path to what it's suppose to be. But for some reason when I try to compile, it says I don't have java installed. I can run servers with no problem, I just cant compile for some reason. I've tried multiple compilers, and they all say that I need to instal java. If you have any advice please help!

item.title: Not recognizing Java
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Not recognizing Java
item.dc:creator: @waiter_8 waiter_8
item.description:
@waiter_8 wrote:

That doesn’t work, you sure you gave me correct code. Btw that code looked exactly like the previous code for the compiler?

Read full topic

item.title: Not recognizing Java
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Put this in your compiler, edit it erase all and replace with…

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
This.

Read full topic
